name: Rolando The Majestic
description:
Help Rolando, a young white glove thief that got everything taken from him avenge the murder of his parents by the hands of the italian mafia. Hide in plain sight, scour the environment for clues and use supernatural powers to avenge your parents in this stealth based narrative adventure.

This is a university project developed by a small group of students.

Key Features:

  • Infiltrate the mafia: The infamous organization got their power abusing ancient artifacts of power and now run rampant as the strongest crime syndicate in the city. Utilize Rolando´s skills as a thief and sneak into their irganization finding clues about how to eliminate the men that took everything from him.
  • Travel through time: With the help of a powerful spirit Rolando can travel to the past through mirrors. With this power he can learn the secrets of the past to exploit those who remain in the present.
  • Haunt the past as a ghost: Whenever Rolando walks through the past he loses his corporeal form and is banished by light. He needs the help of a ususally unwilling host to overcome his new weaknesses.
  • Unlock supernatural powers: The mafia has scoured the country for powerful spirits to keep their grip of the city, unbind these spirits from their captors and claim their powers as your own.
